ygData.subject: RE: Lambent bits and pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe it is having Solusek Ro as a god? That s why my bard chose, and is a common wizard god... Sarah Heacock   sarah@eskimo.com Meara, level 13 Enchanter,
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe it is having Solusek Ro as a god?
That's why my bard chose, and is a common wizard god...

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 8(!) HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (dying
to giant wasps in Misty Thicket)

>-----Original Message-----
>From: John Tatsukawa [mailto:jht@...]
>Sent: Thursday, February 10, 2000 11:36 AM
>To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent bits and pieces
>
>
>From: John Tatsukawa <jht@...>
>
>I've tried this both ways. Used my invis song, got attacked by a shaman.
>Someone cast see invis and invis on me and a friend for corpse
>recovery, and
>I got attacked still. After 5 deaths, I've made my way back to Rathe
>Mountains and now Cazic Thule. =P
>
>Sounds like people are having mixed experiences, but I travelled with 2
>level 30's. One was a dwarf, but I think they're factions are good
>in Sol A.
>The other was a level 30 Erudite Wizard, who calmly walked past a
>wizard who
>blasted me to smithereens. He's been able to walk through that room before
>without getting aggro'd on, so maybe it's just me?
>
>---Windleaf
>

>> From: Lonnie Lewis [mailto:LLewis@...]

>>

>> agro'd on me. I
>> > tried twice walking behind everyone else and it always happened.
>> > Everyone else would pass the goblin that attacked me.
>> >
>> >
